ygData.messageBody:
It allows you to become an inanimate object tree, torch, tent, etc.
I've never had Minor Illusion fade on me, so I've never had to recast it.
I've sat in the middle of the Gnoll camp and right off the path of a hill
giant meditating, and never been bothered by them.

Fiera Mindbender [BAD]
Erudite Enchanter-Xegony
.
